channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two women ‘kicked off a plane for wearing revealing’ crop tops
item.description: A flight attendant asked them to follow the airlines dress code.

item.title: King Charles ‘flew a prototype UFO over Canada in 1975’

item.title: Minnesota Teacher's Massive Pumpkin Wins California Contest
item.description: Travis Gienger's 2,471-pound pumpkin won him the World Championship Pumpkin Weigh-Off in Half Moon Bay for the second year in a row.
